medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 4-day history of abdominal pain. For the past 6 months, she experienced occasional episodes of severe, dull, epigastric/right upper quadrant pain worsening with food intake, resolving spontaneously after a couple of days. Four days prior to presentation, she had another episode that did not resolve after two days, prompting her to seek medical attention. She denies fever and vomiting but endorses mild nausea and possible chills.
